wisdom.snippet: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
Oh, how I love your law! I meditate on it all day long.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart...
Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom...

wealth.snippet: Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.
The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.
You will eat the fruit of your labor; blessings and prosperity will be yours.

health.snippet: Who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases...
With long life I will satisfy him and show him my salvation.
This will bring health to your body and nourishment to your bones.
I will restore you to health and heal your wounds.

influence.snippet: All nations will be blessed through him, and they will call him blessed.
Do you see someone skilled in their work? They will serve before kings...
You are the most excellent of men and your lips have been anointed with grace...
He found them ten times better than all the magicians and enchanters...
